queries.description: Privileged containers lack essential security restrictions and should be avoided by removing the 'privileged' flag or by changing its value to false

queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'vngcloud-csi-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'vngcloud-csi-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'vngcloud-csi-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/dev' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'vngcloud-csi-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/dev' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'vngcloud-csi-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/bs.csi.vngcloud.vn/' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'vngcloud-csi-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/bs.csi.vngcloud.vn/' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'vngcloud-csi-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry/' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'vngcloud-csi-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry/' mounted

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vngcloud-plugin}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-attacher}}.volumeMounts.name={{socket-dir}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-resizer}}.volumeMounts.name={{socket-dir}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{volumemodifier}}.volumeMounts.name={{socket-dir}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{node-driver-registrar}}.volumeMounts.name={{probe-dir}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-provisioner}}.volumeMounts.name={{socket-dir}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vngcloud-plugin}}.volumeMounts.name={{kubelet-dir}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vngcloud-plugin}}.volumeMounts.name={{device-dir}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{vngcloud-plugin}}.volumeMounts.name={{socket-dir}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.query_name: Workload Mounting With Sensitive OS Directory
queries.description: Workload is mounting a volume with sensitive OS Directory

files.expected_value: Workload name 'vngcloud-csi-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry/' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'vngcloud-csi-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry/' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'vngcloud-csi-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/kubelet' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'vngcloud-csi-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/kubelet' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'vngcloud-csi-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/dev' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'vngcloud-csi-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/dev' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'vngcloud-csi-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/bs.csi.vngcloud.vn/' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'vngcloud-csi-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/bs.csi.vngcloud.vn/' with hostPath

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-node}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-node}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-node}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-controller}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-controller}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities
Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.
Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary
Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context
Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-node}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated
metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-controller}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-node}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
metadata.name={{vngcloud-csi-controller}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.description: Container should not use secrets as environment variables
